## Original data

## Reading data

```{r, include=FALSE}
data <- read_delim(here("DATA", "exam_dataset.txt"))

joindata <- read_delim(here("DATA", "exam_joindata.txt"))
```

```{r}
data

joindata
```

### Joining datasets

```{r}
combined_data <- data %>%
  full_join(joindata, join_by("patient_id"), relationship = "many-to-many")
```

```{r}
combined_data
```
